items.title: NICE Backs Leadless Pacemakers for Some Heart Patients
items.description: NICE has issued draft guidance supporting leadless pacemakers for patients with bradyarrhythmias who require single-chamber pacing. Medscape News UK

items.title: Guselkumab Benefits Patients With Skin of Color, Psoriasis
items.description: Guselkumab significantly improves psoriasis severity and quality of life compared with placebo in patients with skin of color. Medscape Medical News
